title: Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design Through Enhanced Self-Determination

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics foundations and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can self-direct the design of mathematical problem-solving processes in a supportive environment.
Learners can enhance deliverables by incorporating instructor and peer feedback during project execution.
Learners can increase academic satisfaction and career maturity through the completion of mathematics projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
